alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Upper Sevier River Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 31 at 2:12PM MDT until November 04 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT WEDNESDAY NIGHT TO MIDNIGHT MDT THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, with the most snow accumulation in and near Bryce Canyon. * WHERE...Upper Sevier River Valleys and Bryce Canyon Country. * WHEN...From midnight Wednesday night to midnight MDT Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions, especially for higher elevation routes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Upper Sevier River Valleys
